title: Go Shape Yourself
description: Go Shape Yourself is a twin stick/WASD and mouse top down shooter focusing on Shape Shifting between shapes of different colours. Whichever colour you are is safe to touch, while the others are lethal. Survive as long as you can and try to get a high score!
controllerControls: Right Stick to Aim and Shoot
A/X/B (Y when unlocked) to Change Shape
